description:
The spell mistake is in the comment of class Service in nova/service.py.
"""Service object for binaries running on hosts.
A service takes a manager and enables rpc by listening to queues based
on topic. It also periodically runs tasks on the manager and reports
it state to the database services table.
"""
In  the comment,the last "it" should be "its".It's a very little spell mistake.
title: spelling mistake in the comment of class Service  in nova/service.py

comments.content:
The spell mistake is in the annotation of class Service in  nova/service.py.
"""Service object for binaries running on hosts.
A service takes a manager and enables rpc by listening to queues based
on topic. It also periodically runs tasks on the manager and reports
it state to the database services table.
"""
In  the annotation,the last "it" should be "its".It's a very little spell mistake.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhanghanqun

comments.content: I don't see how this is a bug.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~matthew-gilliard-u
